means: 地下蓄水层，砂石含水层

word_mean: 存储地下水并能够提供可开采水量的透水岩土层。

sentence.Network_en: The aquifer which had once fed the wells was pronounced dry.
sentence.Network_cn: 曾为水井供水的蓄水层正式宣告干涸了。

sentence.Network_en: An aquifer is a water - bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentence.Network_cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层,如沙岩和白垩岩.

sentence.Network_en: A confined aquifer is also known as a pressure aquifer.
sentence.Network_cn: 承压含水层又叫压力含水层.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... aqueduct n. 导水管 aquifer ? n. 蓄水层 arachnid ? n . 节肢动物.
建筑专业英语词汇(A) ... aqueduct 渡槽 aquifer 含水层 arabesque 阿拉伯式花饰.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... aqueduct n. 引水渠；高架渠 aquifer n. 含水土层 arabesque n. 蔓藤图饰.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Latin aqui- (from aqua 'water') + -fer 'bearing'

entry.tran: 地下蓄水层;砂石含水层
entry.def: In geology, an aquifer is an area of rock underneath the surface of the earth which absorbs and holds water.

means.word_mean: 1. underground bed or layer yielding ground water for wells and springs etc

auth_sentence.content: When that happens, an aquifer is ruined forever.
auth_sentence.res_content: When that happens, an aquifer is ruined forever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When that happens, an aquifer is ruined forever.

auth_sentence.content: Oakland fears that rising seas will salinate its underground aquifer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oakland fears that rising seas will salinate its underground aquifer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oakland fears that rising seas will salinate its underground aquifer.

auth_sentence.content: Permits...issued with the proviso that water...be returned to the same aquifer.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Permits...issued with the proviso that water...be returned to the same aquifer.
